Uses of Class
jsx.ui.Control

Packages that use Control
jsx.ui Contains general classes for representing user interfaces. 
jsx.ui.ctrl Contains classes representing control widgets. 
jsx.ui.html Classes for HTML elementary widgets. 
 

Uses of Control in jsx.ui
 

Methods in jsx.ui with type parameters of type Control
protected static
<S extends Control,T extends S>
void
Control.sub(S s, T t, Id<T> id)
          Helps subclasses to cache the controls of a super type.
 

Methods in jsx.ui that return Control
static Control Control.get(Component e)
          Gets the Control widget associated with a component.
 

Uses of Control in jsx.ui.ctrl
 

Subclasses of Control in jsx.ui.ctrl
 class Checkable
          A base class for checkable widgets resembling HTML radio buttons.
 class Clickable
          A base class for clickable widgets.
 class DblClickable
          A base class for double-clickable widgets.
 class Menu
          A base class for menu widgets.
 class Uncheckable
          A base class for uncheckable widgets resembling HTML check-boxes.
 

Methods in jsx.ui.ctrl with parameters of type Control
 Menu Menu.add(Control c)
          Appends a control to this menu.
 

Uses of Control in jsx.ui.html
 

Subclasses of Control in jsx.ui.html
 class Button
          A base class for HTML elementary button widgets.
 class Checkbox
          A base class for HTML elementary check-box widgets.
 class Choice
          An abstract base class for HTML elementary checkable input widgets.
 class Input
          An abstract base class for HTML elementary input widgets.
 class Label
          A base class for HTML elementary label widgets.
 class Radio
          A base class for HTML elementary radio widgets.
